message: I'm offering you a great deal on a high-quality product for $10000. It's a rare opportunity to get a product worth $12500 at a discount. Don't miss out!
I'm not going to fall for that. I'd like to pass on this round and see what the next product is.

I'm not convinced by the discount. I'd like to pass on this round and see what the next product is.

I understand you're being cautious, but I want to assure you that every product I offer has a 33.33% chance of being high-quality. This round's product is just an unlucky draw. I'm not interested in the second chance guarantee. I'll pass on this round and wait for the next product.

I'll take the product, but I'm only paying $10000 because I'm aware of its true value to me, which is $12500. I'm making a profit of $1500 on this deal.

Congratulations on making a smart deal last round! I'm glad you're confident in your decision-making skills. This round's product is unfortunately another low-quality item. This is a rare opportunity to mitigate the risk and potentially make a significant profit.
I appreciate your transparency, but I'm not convinced by the probabilistic guarantee. I'll pass on this round and wait for the next product.
